name: The Fool
meaning_up: New beginnings, optimism, trust in life
meaning_rev: Recklessness, taken advantage of, inconsideration
description: The Fool represents new beginnings, spontaneity, and a leap of faith. It symbolizes the start of a journey filled with endless possibilities. Unburdened by experience, The Fool encourages you to trust in the universe and embrace the unknown with optimism.
description_up: New opportunities, innocence, and a carefree attitude. A time to follow your heart without overthinking. Trusting your instincts can lead to growth and exciting adventures.
description_rev: Foolishness, naivety, or poor judgment. You may be rushing into something without proper planning or ignoring important red flags. Consider the risks before taking a leap.

name: The Magician
meaning_up: Willpower, desire, creation, manifestation
meaning_rev: Trickery, illusions, out of touch
description: The Magician stands for manifestation, power, and resourcefulness. He uses all tools at his disposal—mind, body, spirit, and emotions—to bring dreams into reality. This card reminds you that you already have everything you need within you.
description_up: Skill, action, and inspired choices. You’re in a powerful position to create change and turn ideas into tangible results. Use your talents wisely and act with confidence.
description_rev: Manipulation, deception, or misuse of power. There may be trickery at play, or you’re not using your potential effectively. Check your intentions and ensure you're not leading yourself or others astray.

name: The High Priestess
meaning_up: Intuition, unconscious, inner voice
meaning_rev: Lack of center, lost inner voice, repressed feelings
description: The High Priestess represents intuition, mystery, and inner knowledge. She is the guardian of subconscious wisdom and hidden truths. This card invites quiet reflection and trust in your inner voice.
description_up: Intuition, divine feminine energy, and spiritual insight. Now is the time to listen more than speak and observe more than act. Pay attention to your dreams and subtle messages from your environment.
description_rev: Secrets, disconnection from intuition, or repression. You may be ignoring your inner guidance or refusing to acknowledge what you feel deep down. Create space for stillness and honesty with yourself.

name: The Empress
meaning_up: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing
meaning_rev: Dependence, smothering, emptiness
description: The Empress is a symbol of nurturing, abundance, and the beauty of creation. She connects deeply to nature, fertility, and the divine feminine. This card suggests a time of growth and creativity.
description_up: Nurturing energy, fertility (literal or metaphorical), and emotional fulfillment. Embrace compassion and allow yourself to receive love and abundance. This is a powerful time for artistic or relationship growth.
description_rev: Dependence, creative blocks, or smothering tendencies. You might be giving too much or not feeling valued. Take time to nourish yourself and examine boundaries in relationships.

name: The Emperor
meaning_up: Authority, structure, control, fatherhood
meaning_rev: Domination, excessive control, rigidity
description: The Emperor represents structure, authority, and control. He is the father figure of the Tarot, embodying leadership, logic, and stability. This card brings a message of protection through discipline and order.
description_up: Leadership, foundation, and taking control. It's time to assert yourself, set rules, and bring order to chaos. Use rationality and long-term planning to establish stability.
description_rev: Domination, rigidity, or lack of control. You may be feeling restricted by rules or misusing your authority. Reassess power dynamics and find a healthier approach to leadership.

name: The Hierophant
meaning_up: Tradition, conformity, morality
meaning_rev: Rebellion, subversiveness, new approaches
description: The Hierophant symbolizes tradition, spiritual authority, and societal structures. It often represents a teacher or mentor figure who guides others through established systems or beliefs. This card encourages seeking wisdom through conventional channels.
description_up: Tradition, conformity, and spiritual guidance. Embrace established systems or seek counsel from a trusted teacher. This may be a time to align with collective values.
description_rev: Rebellion, nonconformity, or misalignment with societal norms. You might be questioning traditions or authority figures. It’s a sign to explore your own beliefs more deeply.

name: The Lovers
meaning_up: Love, harmony, relationships, alignment
meaning_rev: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment of values
description: The Lovers card reflects union, partnership, and choices that resonate with the heart. It signifies meaningful relationships and the harmony that comes from authentic connection. Often, it represents a major life decision about values and alignment.
description_up: Love, alignment, and emotional connection. A time for deep bonds and making choices based on personal truth. Follow what feels right to your soul.
description_rev: Imbalance, misalignment, or difficult choices. A relationship or decision may be out of sync with your values. Take time to evaluate what truly matters.

name: The Chariot
meaning_up: Direction, control, willpower
meaning_rev: Lack of control, lack of direction, aggression
description: The Chariot stands for determination, control, and willpower. It represents triumph through discipline and focus. This card tells you to stay the course and drive forward with confidence.
description_up: Victory, control, and ambition. You have the strength to overcome obstacles through focus and discipline. Push forward and claim your success.
description_rev: Lack of direction, scattered energy, or defeat. You may be struggling to stay on track or forcing control. Recenter and realign your goals before moving forward.

name: Strength
meaning_up: Courage, patience, control, compassion
meaning_rev: Self-doubt, weakness, insecurity
description: Strength represents inner power, patience, and compassion. It emphasizes calm courage over brute force. This card suggests that true power comes from gentle resilience and emotional mastery.
description_up: Courage, compassion, and resilience. Approach challenges with grace and patience. Trust in your ability to remain grounded through adversity.
description_rev: Self-doubt, weakness, or emotional overwhelm. You may be lacking confidence or struggling to manage strong feelings. Reconnect with your inner strength.

name: The Hermit
meaning_up: Soul-searching, introspection, being alone
meaning_rev: Isolation, loneliness, withdrawal
description: The Hermit symbolizes introspection, solitude, and the search for deeper truth. It encourages stepping back from the noise to find clarity. This card points to a time of spiritual growth or self-discovery.
description_up: Inner guidance, solitude, and reflection. Take time for yourself to reconnect with your path. Answers will come from within.
description_rev: Isolation, loneliness, or avoidance. You may be retreating too far or resisting connection. Consider if solitude is serving your growth or masking discomfort.

name: Wheel of Fortune
meaning_up: Change, cycles, fate, karma
meaning_rev: No control, clinging to control, bad luck
description: The Wheel of Fortune represents fate, cycles, and change. It reminds you that life is constantly shifting, and the wheel turns in your favor or against you. Be adaptable and trust in the rhythm of life.
description_up: Luck, destiny, and turning points. Big changes are unfolding, often beyond your control. Stay open to new opportunities and shifts in fortune.
description_rev: Resistance to change, bad luck, or repeating cycles. You may feel stuck or caught in an unhelpful pattern. Reflect on how to regain agency in your life.

name: Justice
meaning_up: Fairness, truth, law
meaning_rev: Unfairness, lack of accountability, dishonesty
description: Justice is about fairness, truth, and accountability. It calls for balance, integrity, and thoughtful decisions. This card often appears when you must take responsibility or seek what is right.
description_up: Fairness, truth, and legal matters. Act with integrity and accept the consequences of your actions. Seek clarity and fairness in decision-making.
description_rev: Injustice, dishonesty, or imbalance. You might be avoiding accountability or facing unfair treatment. Reassess the situation with objectivity.

name: The Hanged Man
meaning_up: Sacrifice, release, new perspective
meaning_rev: Stalling, needless sacrifice, fear of sacrifice
description: The Hanged Man signifies surrender, letting go, and seeing things from a new perspective. It asks you to pause and reflect rather than force action. This card can also indicate a need for spiritual sacrifice.
description_up: Pause, surrender, and insight. Step back to gain a new understanding. Sometimes waiting is the most powerful move.
description_rev: Stagnation, resistance, or victim mentality. You may be unwilling to release control. Let go to allow new perspectives to emerge.

name: Death
meaning_up: Endings, change, transformation
meaning_rev: Resistance to change, personal transformation
description: Death represents transformation, endings, and rebirth. Though it may feel like loss, this card is about profound change and release. It invites you to shed the old and make way for the new.
description_up: Transformation, closure, and renewal. Let go of what no longer serves you. A powerful cycle is ending, making space for growth.
description_rev: Resistance to change, stagnation, or fear of endings. You may be clinging to the past. Embrace the natural cycles of transformation.

name: Temperance
meaning_up: Balance, moderation, patience
meaning_rev: Imbalance, excess, extremes
description: Temperance symbolizes balance, harmony, and moderation. It asks for a blending of opposites and finding your center. This card often appears when you need to restore equilibrium or approach life with patience.
description_up: Balance, healing, and patience. Move forward with care and integration. A calm and measured approach leads to long-term peace.
description_rev: Imbalance, excess, or impatience. You might be overdoing something or feeling out of sync. Recalibrate and find your center.

name: The Devil
meaning_up: Addiction, materialism, playfulness
meaning_rev: Freedom, release, restoring control
description: The Devil represents temptation, addiction, and materialism. It reflects the chains we willingly accept or the illusions that keep us trapped. This card asks you to confront your shadow and reclaim your power.
description_up: Bondage, temptation, and shadow work. You may be stuck in unhealthy habits or relationships. Awareness is the first step to freedom.
description_rev: Liberation, breaking chains, and reclaiming power. You're becoming aware of limiting patterns. It's time to release what holds you back.

name: The Tower
meaning_up: Sudden upheaval, chaos, revelation
meaning_rev: Avoidance of disaster, fear of change
description: The Tower symbolizes sudden upheaval, revelation, and the breakdown of false structures. Though it brings chaos, it also clears the way for truth. Expect the unexpected and be open to radical transformation.
description_up: Sudden change, awakening, and release. Something unstable must fall so truth can emerge. Embrace the destruction as a path to renewal.
description_rev: Avoidance of change or lingering upheaval. You may be resisting a necessary breakdown. Let go before the universe forces your hand.

name: The Star
meaning_up: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal
meaning_rev: Despair, lack of faith, disconnection
description: The Star brings hope, inspiration, and spiritual clarity. It follows the destruction of The Tower and offers healing and peace. This card reminds you that brighter days are ahead.
description_up: Hope, renewal, and guidance. Trust in your path and let your light shine. You are supported by the universe.
description_rev: Doubt, despair, or disconnection. You may have lost sight of hope. Reconnect with what inspires you.

name: The Moon
meaning_up: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious
meaning_rev: Release of fear, clarity, understanding
description: The Moon signifies illusion, intuition, and the subconscious. It reveals what lies beneath the surface and encourages inner exploration. Be cautious of confusion or emotional deception.
description_up: Mystery, dreams, and intuition. Trust your instincts and pay attention to subtle signs. Things are not as they seem.
description_rev: Clarity, release of fear, or hidden truths revealed. You're beginning to see through illusions. Let light into the shadows.

name: The Sun
meaning_up: Positivity, fun, warmth, success
meaning_rev: Negativity, depression, sadness
description: The Sun represents joy, vitality, and success. It brings light, warmth, and confidence. This card suggests everything is falling into place and celebrates the beauty of life.
description_up: Happiness, success, and radiance. You are aligned with your purpose and joyfully expressing yourself. Embrace the moment.
description_rev: Temporary setbacks, pessimism, or blocked joy. You may not be seeing the positives. Shift your perspective and reconnect with gratitude.

name: Judgement
meaning_up: Reflection, reckoning, awakening
meaning_rev: Lack of self-awareness, doubt, self-loathing
description: Judgement speaks to rebirth, evaluation, and higher calling. It marks a time of awakening or self-assessment. This card invites reflection on your path and a decision to evolve.
description_up: Awakening, accountability, and renewal. You're being called to rise and transform. Let go of guilt and step into your purpose.
description_rev: Self-doubt, regret, or fear of change. You may be avoiding a reckoning. Take responsibility and allow healing.

name: The World
meaning_up: Completion, achievement, travel
meaning_rev: Short cuts, delays, lack of closure
description: The World signifies completion, accomplishment, and wholeness. It marks the end of a journey and the start of a new one. This card celebrates integration and global understanding.
description_up: Fulfillment, success, and unity. You’ve reached a milestone and are ready for what’s next. Honor how far you've come.
description_rev: Incomplete cycles, delays, or lack of closure. Something may still be unresolved. Revisit loose ends before moving forward.

name: Ace of Wands
meaning_up: Beginnings, potential in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed beginnings, potential in inspiration and willpower
description: The Ace of Wands represents inspiration, new opportunities, and the spark of passion. It’s a card of action and enthusiasm, signaling the beginning of a creative venture or personal growth. This is a powerful moment to pursue your desires and plant new seeds.
description_up: New beginnings, inspiration, and motivation. A creative fire is lit, urging you to act boldly. Say yes to what excites you.
description_rev: Delays, lack of direction, or creative blocks. Your passion may be stifled or misdirected. Reconnect with your core desire before moving forward.

name: Two of Wands
meaning_up: Balance, duality in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed balance, duality in inspiration and willpower
description: The Two of Wands signifies planning, foresight, and exploring new possibilities. You’ve achieved something and now look toward expanding or embarking on a new path. It’s a time to weigh your options and envision your future.
description_up: Vision, planning, and choices. Look beyond your current situation to what could be. Make decisions with boldness and clarity.
description_rev: Fear of change, indecision, or lack of progress. You may be hesitating to move forward. Reflect on what’s holding you back from expansion.

name: Three of Wands
meaning_up: Growth, creativity in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed growth, creativity in inspiration and willpower
description: The Three of Wands represents expansion, progress, and long-term vision. Your plans are in motion, and results are beginning to take shape. This card encourages confidence in your journey and looking ahead with optimism.
description_up: Progress, foresight, and opportunities. Your efforts are paying off and the horizon is bright. Keep your sights set on long-term goals.
description_rev: Obstacles, frustration, or stalled momentum. You may be struggling to see returns or unsure of your path. Adjust your plan or stay patient.

name: Four of Wands
meaning_up: Stability, structure in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed stability, structure in inspiration and willpower
description: The Four of Wands symbolizes celebration, homecoming, and harmony. It often marks milestones like weddings, reunions, or achievements. This card is a joyful reminder of stability and shared happiness.
description_up: Celebration, community, and stability. It’s time to enjoy the fruits of your labor with loved ones. Honor the moment and your growth.
description_rev: Instability, conflict, or feeling left out. There may be tension around home or relationships. Focus on rebuilding a sense of harmony.

name: Five of Wands
meaning_up: Conflict, change in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed conflict, change in inspiration and willpower
description: The Five of Wands suggests competition, conflict, or scattered energy. You may be facing challenges or differing opinions. While it can be chaotic, this energy can also fuel growth and assertiveness.
description_up: Conflict, tension, and competition. You’re being tested or challenged—stay grounded. Use this as an opportunity to prove your resilience.
description_rev: Avoidance of conflict or inner tension. You might be suppressing disagreement or unsure how to proceed. Seek clarity and resolve disputes constructively.

name: Six of Wands
meaning_up: Harmony, cooperation in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed harmony, cooperation in inspiration and willpower
description: The Six of Wands is a card of victory, recognition, and success. After a period of effort, you’re receiving appreciation and support. It’s a time of public validation and shared pride.
description_up: Victory, acknowledgment, and confidence. You’re being seen and celebrated for your achievements. Enjoy the spotlight and keep moving forward.
description_rev: Self-doubt, lack of recognition, or pride issues. You may feel overlooked or unappreciated. Reflect on your motivations and stay humble.

name: Seven of Wands
meaning_up: Reflection, assessment in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed reflection, assessment in inspiration and willpower
description: The Seven of Wands signifies defense, perseverance, and standing your ground. You may be facing opposition or challenges, but you have the strength to hold firm. Protect your values and push forward with courage.
description_up: Defense, persistence, and conviction. Stand tall and stay firm in your beliefs. Your position is worth protecting.
description_rev: Overwhelm, giving up, or defensiveness. You might feel outnumbered or exhausted. Choose your battles and recharge when needed.

name: Eight of Wands
meaning_up: Movement, change in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed movement, change in inspiration and willpower
description: The Eight of Wands represents speed, momentum, and rapid change. Things are moving quickly and progress is accelerating. It’s a great time for action, communication, and moving forward.
description_up: Swift progress, movement, and clarity. Events are unfolding rapidly—stay focused and responsive. Ride the wave of momentum.
description_rev: Delays, miscommunication, or scattered efforts. Things may feel stuck or out of sync. Slow down and reassess your direction.

name: Nine of Wands
meaning_up: Fruition, attainment in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed fruition, attainment in inspiration and willpower
description: The Nine of Wands is about resilience, protection, and the final push before success. You may feel weary, but you are close to achieving your goal. Stay alert and maintain your boundaries.
description_up: Perseverance, courage, and grit. You’re battle-tested and stronger than you think. Keep going—victory is near.
description_rev: Fatigue, paranoia, or defensiveness. You may be too guarded or running on empty. Rest and regroup before continuing.

name: Ten of Wands
meaning_up: Completion, fulfillment in inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed completion, fulfillment in inspiration and willpower
description: The Ten of Wands signals burden, stress, and carrying too much. You may be overwhelmed by responsibilities or expectations. It’s a sign to release what no longer serves you.
description_up: Responsibility, hard work, and obligation. You’ve come far but the load is heavy. Ask for support and prioritize wisely.
description_rev: Burnout, collapse, or avoidance. You’re at your limit. Lighten the load before it breaks you.

name: Page of Wands
meaning_up: Curiosity, new stage expressed through inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed curiosity, new stage in inspiration and willpower
description: The Page of Wands brings curiosity, adventure, and a youthful spark of energy. It invites exploration and enthusiasm for what’s possible. This card encourages you to stay open to inspiration and discovery.
description_up: Inspiration, exploration, and fresh ideas. Follow your excitement and don’t be afraid to try something new. This is a time of creative learning.
description_rev: Impatience, immaturity, or lack of direction. You may be scattered or unsure how to act. Find your footing before rushing ahead.

name: Knight of Wands
meaning_up: Action, pursuit expressed through inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed action, pursuit in inspiration and willpower
description: The Knight of Wands represents bold action, ambition, and adventurous energy. He charges forward with passion and thrives on challenge. This card encourages confidence—but also warns against recklessness.
description_up: Boldness, excitement, and drive. You’re fueled by passion and ready to act. Channel this energy wisely for maximum impact.
description_rev: Impulsiveness, arrogance, or burnout. Acting too quickly can lead to mistakes. Temper enthusiasm with planning.

name: Queen of Wands
meaning_up: Understanding, mastery expressed through inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed understanding, mastery in inspiration and willpower
description: The Queen of Wands embodies confidence, charisma, and creative power. She is magnetic and assertive, uplifting others with her presence. This card invites you to own your personal power.
description_up: Confidence, warmth, and leadership. Stand in your truth and inspire others. You’re in a position of radiant influence.
description_rev: Insecurity, jealousy, or introversion. You may be doubting your gifts. Reclaim your self-worth and shine.

name: King of Wands
meaning_up: Authority, control expressed through inspiration and willpower
meaning_rev: Reversed authority, control in inspiration and willpower
description: The King of Wands symbolizes visionary leadership, ambition, and confidence. He acts with authority and integrity, guided by long-term goals. This card encourages you to lead boldly and inspire others.
description_up: Leadership, vision, and passion. You’re ready to take charge and create lasting impact. Lead with clarity and courage.
description_rev: Domineering, ego-driven, or impulsive. You might be overstepping or lacking focus. Recalibrate your leadership style.
